#1
```{r num1}
vectorA <- c(1,2,3,4,5)
matrixA <- matrix(0,nrow = 5, ncol = 5)
for (i in 1:5){
  for (j in 1:5){
    matrixA[i, j]<- abs(vectorA[i] - vectorA[j])
  }
}

matrixA
```
#2
```{r num2}
num_rows <- 5
for(i in 1:num_rows){
  for(j in 1:i){
    cat("*")
  }
  cat("\n")
}
```
#3
```{r num3}
n <- as.numeric(readline("Enter the starting number for the Fibonacci sequence: "))

a <- n
b <- n

cat(a, "")

repeat{ 
  c <- a + b
if (c > 500 ){
  break
}
cat(c, "")
a <- b
b <- c
}
cat("\n")
```
